subsection.label: patches
subsection.title: Patches
subsection.p: If you would like your changes to be included into , please submit a unified diff created from the SVN repository. Submit a bug with the patch attached along with a description of what the patch changes.

subsection.label: style
subsection.title: Coding Style
subsection.p: Inorder to keep the source-code of clean and readable, those who wish to contribute code to should review the project's coding style guide-lines.
